title: Bloomberg Markets: Sheth on `Invisble Tech' Behind Chatbots
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sheth on `Invisble Tech' Behind Chatbots
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Beerud Sheth CEO and Founder Gupshup Discussing how will chatbot software will continue to develop over the next few years and disrupt everything from ecommerce to fintech.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
